name: tm14
effect: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A vicious snow-and-
wind attack that
may freeze the foe.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A brutal snow-and-
wind attack that
may freeze the foe.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is blasted
with a blizzard.
It may freeze the
foe solid.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the foe. It may also freeze
the target solid.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the foe. It may also freeze
the target solid.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the foe. It may also freeze
the target solid.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike
the opposing team. It may also freeze
them solid.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike
the opposing team. It may also freeze
them solid.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave
the opposing Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing
Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing
Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user flies up into the sky and then
strikes its target on the next turn.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that
paralyzes the target.
